doc.field: "Manual of Operations for Marine Companies", 1980s, revoked 1996. "Captains Course: Fire Operations Command", 1994. Pocket binder of some material for first line supervisors training, 1980s. Also a larger binder of "First Line Supervisors Training Program" (FLSTP), circa late 1970s, with later tearsheet inserts in pockets. Binder labeled "OITS" (Officers Induction Training School), 1970s training/orientation material (some references to "Lift program"). Binder labeled "Training Bulletins: APP-First Aid" but seems to have broader training material with core dating from 1970s-90s, with later tearsheets inserted by Spadafora. Binder labeled "Legislation," includes reference material on legal matters, both specific to firefighters and general (hiring). Binder labeled "CWD, 14-" includes various FDNY training/lesson plans, 1980s with later tearsheet etc inserts. Binder labeled "TBs: Tools" includes training material on saws, flashlights, masks, and other equipment, again 1980s-90s, with later inserts.
